verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee
E'en though it be a cross
That raiseth me
Still all my song shall be

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer my God to Thee
Nearer to Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though like the wanderer
The sun gone down
Darkness be over me
My rest a stone
Yet in my dreams I'd be

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There let the way appear
Steps unto heaven
All that Thou sendest me
In mercy giv'n
Angels to beckon me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Then with my waking tho'ts
Bright with Thy praise
Out of my stony griefs
Bethel I'll raise
So by my woes to be

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Or if on joyful wing
Cleaving the sky
Sun moon and stars forgot
Upward I fly
Still all my song shall be
